item.title: By: Lindsay Kennedy
item.dc:creator: Lindsay Kennedy
item.description: Thank you for this post. One of the trouble with labels is their 'clarification' often needs clarification, but yours are helpful and needed.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for this post. One of the trouble with labels is their ‘clarification’ often needs clarification, but yours are helpful and needed.

item.title: By: rosalie
item.dc:creator: rosalie
item.description: Heard Waldron's presentation Feb. 24. Excellent. Gave me much to consider and purchased several of his books.
